thread.title: Mariah Carey shows off curves in skintight mini dress
thread.title_full: Mariah Carey shows off curves in skintight mini dress | Daily Mail Online

author: Dailymail.com Reporter
title: Mariah Carey shows off curves in skintight mini dress
text:
She's showing off what her mama gave her.
And Mariah Carey had no problem flaunting her curves in a skintight mini-dress Wednesday as she arrived for her performance on Jimmy Kimmel Live in Los Angeles.
The 46-year-old pop star looked incredible, pairing the barely-there dress with fishnet stockings.
She's got it! Mariah Carey had no problem flaunting her curves in a skintight mini-dress Wednesday as she arrived for her performance on Jimmmy Kimmel Live in Los Angeles
The dress, complete with a small belt that cinched in her waist, plunged low on the singers neckline to show off her ample cleavage and the long sleeves provided a bit of modesty.
The mother-of-two's long caramel hair flowed down her back styled in beachy waves and parted down the center.
Her flawless makeup highlighted the singer's gorgeous complexion and she highlighted her face in all the right places.
She completed her outfit with gorgeous diamond necklaces that plunged down into her cleavage.
Showing it off! The dress plunged low on the singers neckline to show off her ample cleavage and the long sleeves provided a bit of modesty
Beachy vibe: The mother of two's long caramel hair flowed down her back styled in beachy waves and parted down the center
The pop star will perform live on the show for the first time since her NYE performance in Times Square that was wracked with audio issues.
Mariah will perform her latest hit I Don't on the show, tweeting the news herself:
'Going to perform my new song #IDont on Jimmy Kimmel live on Wednesday! See you soon @jimmykimmel!'
Trying again: The pop star will perform live on the show for the first time since her NYE performance in Times Square that was wracked with audio issues
Mariah spent a cozy Valentine's Day with her backup singer beau, Bryan Tanaka, on Tuesday.
She flaunted her new relationship with her 33-year-old Valentine on Instagram for all of her 5.3 million followers to see.
The image showed the couple enjoying the romantic holiday in a hot tub with glasses of champagne in hand.
Hot and heavy: Mariah spent a cozy Valentine's Day with her backup singer beau, Bryan Tanaka, on Tuesday
The hit-maker captioned the candid snap with: 'Happy Valentine's Day!! #happy #moments #bubbles.'
The blonde beauty looked genuinely happy and showed off a large smile while soaking in the tub with her new love.
The happy couple each held a red champagne flute and a bottle of bubbly could be seen in the background.
The duo met on tour when Mariah was still engaged to James Packer, but they hit it off and have been dating ever since
